questions.question: Signing up for Zesthealth Kids Baby Book App is easy
questions.answer:
1. Visit the Zesthealth Kids Baby Book Sign Up page 
  2. Click on 'Register as New User'
  3. Select your country of origin
  4. Enter your first and last name
  5. Enter your mobile number and email address
  6. Create a password and confirm it
  7. Agree to the terms of use and privacy policy
  8. Click on 'Register'

9. Verify your account via email and mobile number for added security.

questions.question: To log in to your account
questions.answer:
1. Go to Zesthealth Kids babybook Login page
  2. Enter your email and password
  3. Click 'Login'

3. Enter the verification code sent to your email address

4. Verify your account and log in.

questions.question: Creating a baby book
questions.answer:
1. Click on 'Create a Baby Book'
  2. Enter your baby's nickname
  3. Choose a display picture
  4. Enter your baby's birthdate
  5. Click 'Save'

questions.question: Filling in general information
questions.answer:
1. Select the baby book you want to fill in
  2. Click on the 'General Information' tab

3. Enter your baby's general information, insurance details, emergency contacts, and general contacts.

4. Double check the information before saving

5. Click 'Save' at the bottom to store the information.

questions.question: Can I create multiple baby book?
questions.answer:
Certainly! You have the option to create multiple baby books simultaneously, as long as you ensure that each baby is unique and not duplicated. To create a baby book, follow these steps:

  1. Navigate to the overview section and locate the 'Create Baby Book' button.
  2. Click on the button to initiate the creation process.
  3. Provide all the necessary details and information required to save the baby book.


By following these instructions, you can create multiple baby books while ensuring that each one is distinct and personalized.

questions.question: Using Milestones
questions.answer:
Milestones allow you to track your child's developmental achievements. They are divided into different categories such as social and emotional, language and communication, cognitive, and physical development. To create your baby's first milestone:

1. Click on the 'Create Milestone Album' button to create an album.

2. Choose between 'Standard' or 'Unique Milestone' You can create both standard and unique milestones.

3. For a Standard Milestone:

  • Select an album name
  • Select the milestone age
  • Select the milestone
  • Upload a photo (optional)
  • Add a caption (optional)
  • Click the 'Create' button to save

4. Create an album name

  • Upload a photo (optional)
  • Add a caption (optional)
  • Click the 'Create' button to save

questions.question: I can’t upload a specific milestone in the standard milestone
questions.answer: In the milestone section, you can see the button for “Create Milestone Album” click the button then choose “Unique Milestone” from here you can upload customize milestones for your baby.

questions.question: My child did not achieve a certain milestone, is there something wrong with my child?
questions.answer: Developmental milestones serve as markers for a child's growth and development. However, it is important to remember that every child develops at their own pace in different areas. If you have concerns about your child's development due to unmet milestones, it is recommended to consult a healthcare professional who can provide a comprehensive evaluation. Parenting can be challenging, and it is natural to experience anxiety about various aspects of your child's well-being. Seeking guidance from a pediatrician can offer reassurance and support.

Immunizations
questions.answer:
Immunizations follow the immunization schedule on different versions of baby book. This helps you identify and track the vaccinations your child has already had and the ones they are supposed to have in the near future. Each vaccine has an indicated due date, calculated based on your child's date of birth.


Version template Immunizations

questions.question: I can't find a vaccination schedule fit for my child, what should I do?
questions.answer:
You can always customize your vaccine schedule according to your doctor, you can scroll down go to custom check-up, click add new record and create your own vaccination schedule


You can also send a suggestion or recommendation by contacting us. Remember to put your Subject as Immunization Schedule Request. In the contents of your message put a reference for the immunization schedule requested and other details such as country of origin, year released and source.
